original_text: Beat some of the incense to make powder. Put this in front of the Covenant Box, in the Tent of Meeting. That is where I will meet with you. This incense will be a very holy thing for you.
korean_text: 그 향 얼마를 곱게 찧어 내가 너와 만날 회막 안 증거궤 앞에 두라 이 향은 너희에게 지극히 거룩하니라

sentences.original_text: Beat some of the incense to make powder.
Put this in front of the Covenant Box,
That is where I will meet with you.
This incense will be a very holy thing for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 향은 너희를 위해 매우 거룩한 것이 될 것입니다.
